Changeset.Change: Simpler signatures in methods that return streams (failures are now not modelled in return type)
Adoption of streams and independence from gRS (but for configuration of ports)
new test suites based on in-container mocking with no dependencies on sample-plugin left
Aligned with gCF 1.6.0+ and eliminated dependencies on legacy scope handling mechanisms
Internally refactored to align with changes in dependencies
Fix: TBinder now discovers plugins on load
Fix:Source change events correctly notified and observed
Fix:Resource Property changes now correctly published
Fix: Scope now explicitly set on published DataSource
Fix: increased read/write timeouts to 3 mins from 30 secs
increased read/write timeouts form 3 mins to 5 mins
